thread.section_title: Art Hotel Batignolles - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 2 Nights in Paris
thread.title_full: 2 Nights in Paris - Review of Art Hotel Batignolles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Octavia J
title: 2 Nights in Paris
text:
We visited Paris, and we booked this hotel for 2 nights, at a great price.We just wanted something nice, good location and we found Art Hotel.The room was very nice(only a bit small and I would suggest new carpets).
Very friendly and helpful staff.Great bakery 2 minutes away from the hotel and the metro station was just 5 minutes walk.
Octavia,
London
